discussion.author: affeldt-aist
discussion.comment: For the record, we have been using this modification to generate the documentation of MathComp-Analysis and that seems to be ok.

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: Maybe we should try to regenerate the doc of mathcomp and make a diff?

discussion.author: affeldt-aist
discussion.comment:
It turns out that this fix also fixes problems in the mathcomp documentation:
- https://math-comp.github.io/htmldoc_1_14_0/mathcomp.ssreflect.ssrnotations.html (e^`() notation)
- https://math-comp.github.io/htmldoc_1_14_0/mathcomp.solvable.abelian.html ('Ldiv_n() notation)
- https://math-comp.github.io/htmldoc_1_14_0/mathcomp.algebra.poly.html (p^`() notation)
(I noticed thanks to a diff.)

discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: I'll merge next thursday if there is no further comment.
